Package com.example.Fiszki.security.auth

Class AuthenticationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.Fiszki.security.auth.AuthenticationController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/flashcards/auth/") public class AuthenticationController extends Object
Controller class handling authentication-related endpoints.
